user_question: How can a robot be programmed to identify and sort different types of recyclable materials?
final_answer: A robot can be programmed to identify and sort different types of recyclable materials using computer vision techniques, such as convolutional neural networks (CNNs), to classify materials based on their visual characteristics. The robot can then use robotic arms to sort the materials into appropriate bins.
